an6.39:4.3: Lobho nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāya, doso nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāya, moho nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāya.
an6.39:4.5: atha kho, bhikkhave, lobhā lobhova samudeti.
an6.39:4.7: atha kho, bhikkhave, dosā dosova samudeti.
an6.39:4.9: atha kho, bhikkhave, mohā mohova samudeti.
an6.39:4.10: Na, bhikkhave, lobhajena kammena dosajena kammena mohajena kammena devā paññāyanti, manussā paññāyanti, yā vā panaññāpi kāci sugatiyo.
an6.39:4.11: Atha kho, bhikkhave, lobhajena kammena dosajena kammena mohajena kammena nirayo paññāyati tiracchānayoni paññāyati pettivisayo paññāyati, yā vā panaññāpi kāci duggatiyo.
an6.39:4.12: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi nidānāni kammānaṃ samudayāya.
an6.39:5.3: Alobho nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāya, adoso nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāya, amoho nidānaṃ kammānaṃ samudayāya.
an6.39:5.5: atha kho, bhikkhave, alobhā alobhova samudeti.
an6.39:5.7: atha kho, bhikkhave, adosā adosova samudeti.
an6.39:5.9: atha kho, bhikkhave, amohā amohova samudeti.
an6.39:5.10: Na, bhikkhave, alobhajena kammena adosajena kammena amohajena kammena nirayo paññāyati tiracchānayoni paññāyati pettivisayo paññāyati, yā vā panaññāpi kāci duggatiyo.
an6.39:5.11: Atha kho, bhikkhave, alobhajena kammena adosajena kammena amohajena kammena devā paññāyanti, manussā paññāyanti, yā vā panaññāpi kāci sugatiyo.
an6.39:5.12: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, tīṇi nidānāni kammānaṃ samudayāyā”ti.
